enigma_edit.model

Class Tileset.ClusterImage

  • java.lang.Object
    • enigma_edit.model.Tileset.VariantImage
      • enigma_edit.model.Tileset.ClusterImage
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Renderable, java.lang.Iterable<Tileset.Image>
    Enclosing class:
    Tileset

    public static class Tileset.ClusterImage
extends Tileset.VariantImage
    Variant image with cluster data. This provides an image for each connection configuration.
